description: This data is a summary of Rain gauges spread through out the country, As published by the Kenya Meteorological Department. The data-set lists the Year of installation, decommissioning and relative location of this infrastructure.

name: National Register of Rain Gauge Stations status since 1900 : 115 Years of Rainfall Data
